title: Failure To Update
body: Was Hopping on through the NA client update went up to 33% and scanned one file a pop-up came out saying to check the logs which i did, but didn't know what to do. So I followed a guide somewhere on this section of help and support. I was able to download the patch on EU servers but when i switch back to NA the patch is still giving me the "Unspecified Error". So, here I am asking for help from Riot :)

replies.body: Are you still having this issue?  There was a short period where players were unable to patch.  The issue should now be resolved, but let me know!

> [{quoted}](name=Porocles,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=h7xhoyxa,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2016-10-08T20:52:20.418+0000)
>
> Are you still having this issue?  There was a short period where players were unable to patch.  The issue should now be resolved, but let me know!

Yeah it worked after i got back home thank you guys!
